md:
giải nghĩa từ "resource" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Resource (noun) - Nguồn lực, tài nguyên
	+ Meaning: Something that can be used to help or support someone or something.
	+ Example: The company has a lot of resources to invest in new projects.
	+ Related words: human resource, natural resource, resourceful

* Resource (verb) - Sử dụng, khai thác
	+ Meaning: To use something in a way that is effective and efficient.
	+ Example: We need to resource our team with the latest technology to stay competitive.
	+ Related words: resourcefulness, resourcing

* Resourceful (adjective) - Sáng tạo, tài năng
	+ Meaning: Having the ability to find quick and clever ways to overcome difficulties.
	+ Example: She's a very resourceful person and always finds a way to solve problems.
	+ Related words: resource, resourcefulness
html:
giải nghĩa từ "resource" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  • Resource (noun) - Nguồn lực, tài nguyên

    • Meaning: Something that can be used to help or support someone or something.
    • Example: The company has a lot of resources to invest in new projects.
    • Related words: human resource, natural resource, resourceful

  • Resource (verb) - Sử dụng, khai thác

    • Meaning: To use something in a way that is effective and efficient.
    • Example: We need to resource our team with the latest technology to stay competitive.
    • Related words: resourcefulness, resourcing

  • Resourceful (adjective) - Sáng tạo, tài năng

    • Meaning: Having the ability to find quick and clever ways to overcome difficulties.
    • Example: She's a very resourceful person and always finds a way to solve problems.
    • Related words: resource, resourcefulness
